results.title: Rosalie Kunoth-Monks portrait
results.credit_line: Courtesy the National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
results.brief_description: Due to Jedda’s popularity and interest in Aboriginal ‘kitsch’ and culture, Arrernte actress Kunoth-Monks and Jedda became entwined. But she never acted again, instead becoming an advocate for Australia’s First Peoples.
results.credit_line_for_label: Courtesy the National Film and Sound Archive of Australia

results.title: Prisoner theme 7-inch vinyl single
results.brief_description: Prisoner packed a punch when it premiered in 1979. Set in the fictional suburb of Wentworth, the female-centred prison drama reverberated around the world, spawning international adaptations and a massive cult following.
results.description:
Vinyl record “On The Inside - The Original TV Theme From Prisoner Cell Block H” - Lynne Hamilton
Phonographic Copyright (p) – Grundy Org. Australia
Copyright (c) – Grundy Org. Australia
Distributed By – Precision Records & Tapes Limited
Published By – ATV Music
Pressed By – P.R. Records Limited
